# janine

[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/jchiquet/janine.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jchiquet/janine)

The goal of janine is to perform sparse network reconstruction when the underlying network is supposed to have a SBM-Laplace distribution.

## Installation

You can install the development version of janine from github

``` r
remotes::install_github("jchiquet/janine")
```
